changeSet.createView: SELECT p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, p.domain AS parent_domain, c.domain AS child_domain, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, n.id, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, n.version FROM edge n JOIN existential p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN existential rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN existential c ON n.child = c.id JOIN existential u ON n.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON n.workspace = w.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.workspace = w.id AND wa.reference = n.id WHERE n.inference IS NULL
